			}
		}

			}
		}

	}
}

					has_state_flag = TUR_georgian_state
					has_state_flag = TUR_romanian_state
					has_state_flag = TUR_assyrian_state
					has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = TUR_autonomous_region scope = TUR }
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = TUR_continuing_ottomanism_efforts
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_idea_effect_rhodopes_no_effect
	}
}

	name = TUR_ottoman_state_idea_effect_malesevo
	text = {
		trigger = {
			759 = {
				has_state_flag = TUR_armenian_state
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_idea_effect_malesevo_minority_armenian
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			759 = {
				has_state_flag = TUR_arab_state
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_idea_effect_malesevo_minority_arab
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			759 = {
				has_state_flag = TUR_greek_state
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_idea_effect_malesevo_minority_greek
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			759 = {
				has_state_flag = TUR_southslav_state
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_idea_effect_malesevo_minority_southslav
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			759 = {
				has_state_flag = TUR_albanian_state
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_idea_effect_malesevo_minority_albanian
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			759 = {
				has_state_flag = TUR_kurd_state
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_idea_effect_malesevo_minority_kurd
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			759 = {
				has_state_flag = TUR_georgian_state
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_idea_effect_malesevo_minority_georgian
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			759 = {
				has_state_flag = TUR_romanian_state
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_idea_effect_malesevo_minority_romanian
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			759 = {
				has_state_flag = TUR_assyrian_state
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_idea_effect_malesevo_minority_assyrian
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			759 = {
				NOT = {
					has_state_flag = TUR_armenian_state
					has_state_flag = TUR_arab_state
					has_state_flag = TUR_greek_state
					has_state_flag = TUR_southslav_state
					has_state_flag = TUR_albanian_state
					has_state_flag = TUR_kurd_state
					has_state_flag = TUR_georgian_state
					has_state_flag = TUR_romanian_state
					has_state_flag = TUR_assyrian_state
					has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = TUR_autonomous_region scope = TUR }
				}
			}
			has_completed_focus = TUR_continuing_ottomanism_efforts
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_idea_effect_malesevo_minority_assyrian
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			759 = {
				NOT = {
					has_state_flag = TUR_armenian_state
					has_state_flag = TUR_arab_state
					has_state_flag = TUR_greek_state
					has_state_flag = TUR_southslav_state
					has_state_flag = TUR_albanian_state
					has_state_flag = TUR_kurd_state
					has_state_flag = TUR_georgian_state
					has_state_flag = TUR_romanian_state
					has_state_flag = TUR_assyrian_state
					has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = TUR_autonomous_region scope = TUR }
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = TUR_continuing_ottomanism_efforts
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_idea_effect_malesevo_no_effect
	}
}

					has_state_flag = TUR_kurd_state
					has_state_flag = TUR_georgian_state
					has_state_flag = TUR_romanian_state
					has_state_flag = TUR_assyrian_state
					has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = TUR_autonomous_region scope = TUR }
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = TUR_continuing_ottomanism_efforts
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_idea_effect_corfu_no_effect
	}
}

		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_idea_effect_skopje_minority_assyrian

			106 = {
				NOT = {

					has_state_flag = TUR_arab_state

	text = {
		trigger = {
			871 = {
				is_controlled_by = ROOT
				has_variable = TUR_ottoman_state_production_speed_buildings_factor
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_production_speed_buildings_factor_vlore_yes
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			871 = {
				is_controlled_by = ROOT
				NOT = {
					has_variable = TUR_ottoman_state_production_speed_buildings_factor
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_minority_no
	}
}

				}
			}
			has_completed_focus = TUR_continuing_ottomanism_efforts
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_idea_effect_montenegro_minority_assyrian
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			105 = {
				NOT = {
					has_state_flag = TUR_armenian_state

	text = {
		trigger = {
			107 = {
				is_controlled_by = ROOT
				has_variable = TUR_ottoman_resistance_growth
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_resistance_growth_serbia_yes
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			107 = {
				is_controlled_by = ROOT
				NOT = {
					has_variable = TUR_ottoman_resistance_growth
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_minority_no
	}
}

			}
			has_completed_focus = TUR_continuing_ottomanism_efforts
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_idea_effect_pirot_minority_assyrian
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			821 = {
				NOT = {
					has_state_flag = TUR_armenian_state
					has_state_flag = TUR_arab_state
					has_state_flag = TUR_greek_state

					has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = TUR_autonomous_region scope = TUR }
				}
			}
			has_completed_focus = TUR_continuing_ottomanism_efforts
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_idea_effect_al_hajara_minority_assyrian
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			675 = {
				NOT = {
					has_state_flag = TUR_armenian_state

					has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = TUR_autonomous_region scope = TUR }
				}
			}
			has_completed_focus = TUR_continuing_ottomanism_efforts
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_idea_effect_damascus_minority_assyrian
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			554 = {
				NOT = {
					has_state_flag = TUR_armenian_state
					has_state_flag = TUR_arab_state

					has_state_flag = TUR_romanian_state
					has_state_flag = TUR_assyrian_state
					has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = TUR_autonomous_region scope = TUR }
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = TUR_continuing_ottomanism_efforts
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_idea_effect_trablusgarp_no_effect
	}
}

		}

			448 = {
				has_state_flag = TUR_assyrian_state
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_idea_effect_trablus_minority_assyrian
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			448 = {
				NOT = {
					has_state_flag = TUR_armenian_state

			}
			has_completed_focus = TUR_continuing_ottomanism_efforts
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_idea_effect_trablus_minority_assyrian
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			448 = {
				NOT = {
					has_state_flag = TUR_armenian_state
					has_state_flag = TUR_arab_state

					has_state_flag = TUR_romanian_state
					has_state_flag = TUR_assyrian_state
					has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = TUR_autonomous_region scope = TUR }
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = TUR_continuing_ottomanism_efforts
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_idea_effect_bessarabia_no_effect
	}
}
